words.source: Proper noun, name of Jacob's son and his tribe. All major translations (KJV, ESV, NASB) render identically.
Qal imperfect 3ms from דין (din, 'to judge'). KJV 'shall judge'; NASB 'will judge'; ESV 'will judge'.
Noun עם (am, 'people') with 3ms possessive suffix וֹ. All translations: 'his people'.
Preposition כ (ke, 'as') + numeral אחד (echad, 'one'). KJV, NASB, ESV all render 'as one'.
Construct plural of שבט (shebet, 'tribe'). Construct form indicates genitive relationship. All translations: 'of the tribes'.
Proper noun, name of Jacob and his descendants. All major translations render identically.
